segments.text: How long have you been washing clothes here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I started washing here about three years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can wash my clothes for less money here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is my first time washing clothes here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What reason are you washing here today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't wash at home because my machine is broken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to continue washing your clothes here for a while ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Washing clothes at a Laundromat costs a lot less money .
segments.speaker: S2
